title: [Ta'Illistim Keep, Lobby]
description: Tall leaded glaesine windows permit light to enter, the soft rays glancing across the dark green marble floors of the great lobby.  Through the eastern windows, airships are visible arriving and departing the docks, which are raised above the level of most city rooftops.

Tall leaded glaesine windows permit moonlight to enter, the soft rays glancing across the dark green marble floors of the great lobby.  Through the eastern windows, the lights of airships floating above the city docks are visible.
